content: introducing the the alice fingerless gloves perfect for fall and winter wear using worsted weight 4 yarn you can create finished gloves that are warm but have a lighter weight these gloves are fun to wear while keeping your hands cozy its great have your fingers free for texting or taking pictures on your phone the iris stitch is used in the body of the glove and the cuff is created using fpdc bpdc ribbing this fingerless glove pattern is perfect for adventurous beginners or intermediate crocheters
